radiographic_examinations.findings: Extensive bilateral nephrocalcinosis and multiple renal parenchymal cysts (maximum size, 2 cm x 2.9 cm); reduced renal function with a serum creatinine concentration of 1.4 mg/dL.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Within 1 month of treatment with rifampin, serum creatinine improved to 1.1 mg/dL.
